para.text: When conducting installation, operation, and maintenance work on the machine, be sure to protect your body from the following potential hazards.

para.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:11px; line-height:1.18;
para.text: Be sure to always use protective equipment to protect your body from these hazards. Some examples of protective equipment are shown below.
